Network

Class NeuronalNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • Network.NeuronalNetwork

  • public class NeuronalNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    lss Class to hold the neural network itself. Uses an array of AbstractNeurons. Initialised in constructor only to supply sampling rate: otherwise initialised in setup
